## getFriendlyAssetName() function

Returns a readable name of the asset

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function getFriendlyAssetName(asset: Pick<Asset, "name" | "chunkNames" | "chunks">): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  asset | Pick&lt;Asset, "name" \| "chunkNames" \| "chunks"&gt; | webpack stats asset |

<b>Returns:</b>

string
